1: <pb/><e>Sb'it David jun tic, tzc'an junc mach tzjucb'tzan b'it yet' jun tzo'n̈ yamc'ab' ch'an̈ 'aych 'a 'a</e> <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal, ach tzin a b'oyaj 'a stojlal, ta'wj in yic tzin 'awj 'ayach. A yic ya waji, ach xo in ac' b'oxoc. 'O'ch cab' wal a c'ojl 'ayn ticnec, tzab'n in lesl tic.</t>
2: <t>Ex wit 'anma'il, ¿b'a'n̈ wal 'oj eyactc eyaln in peclal? ¿B'a'n̈ wal 'oj eyactc can eyaln paxti to may yel'chi?</t>
3: <t>'Ojquejec 'eli to a Jehová a 'ix si'n 'elt eb' 'aych snab'en 'a 'a, yic tz'och eb' yico'oc; a yic tzin 'awji, tzin sta'wjn̈ej.</t>
4: <pb/><t>'Ib'xan̈c chan̈ yuj xiwlal, man̈x cab' pax 'och e mul. A yic c'otnexx 'eq'ui, 'a yic sictac eyaji, tze b'eyc'ojlan e b'a.</t>
5: <t>'A'c 'och yipc e c'ojl Jehová. A xajmb'al to smoj tzeyac'a, a tzeyac' 'a 'a.</t>
6: <pb/><t>Til wal eb' tzaln 'ixtic: Comnoc 'ay mach tzch'oxn quil wach'l cha, xchi eb'. Mamin Jehová, ch'ox quil a wach'l chi 'on̈.</t>
7: <t>Ach 'ix ac' in tzaljc'ojlal, yel xo wal niwn yel'ch 'a yib'n̈ yic eb' caw niwn sat yawb'en tzmolo.</t>
8: <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, a yic tzin 'ec' c'otan, tzaljc'ojlal tzcot in wayan̈, yujto ach 'aychn̈ej 'och wet'oc, yuj cha, may tas tzin 'i'ni.</t>
